description: Rehabilitation of the Water and Sanitation Facilities for the Republic of Sierra Leone Armed Forces (RSLAF) barracks in Freetown

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: This project aims to enhance stability and improve operational capacity of the armed forces by rehabitation works and supply of reliable water and sanatationfacilites. It is expected this will help to quickly improve the living conditions of RSLAF officers and their families through in the three main and most populated barracks in the Freetown area (Wilberforce, Murray Town and Goderich).
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: PBF-Rehab Watsan Fac RSLAF

title: PBF- Rehab of WatSan Facilities for RSLAF
